parameterdescription.para: The identifier used in a ping/pong communication. Set to zero if you don't want to overlap ping messages

briefdescription.para: Creates a new PingPongMessage object from serialised data.
Gets a PingPongMessage from another object. Use this to avoid casts.

parameterdescription.para: The object to obtain the PingPongMessage from.
The identifier used in a ping/pong communcation. Set to zero if you don't want to overlap ping messages

simplesect.para: One on success, Zero on failure.

briefdescription.para: Initialises a PingPongMessage object from serialised data.

simplesect.para: One on success, Zero on failure.

briefdescription.para: Deserialises a PingPongMessage so that it can be used as an object.

simplesect.para: Length read if successful, zero otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Serialises a PingPongMessage to the byte data.

simplesect.para: Length written if successful, zero otherwise.
